title: Fellowship
description:
Fellowship One RESTful API is a REST based web application that uses several open protocols and patterns to provide consumers access to secure resources. STANDARDS, PROTOCOLS, and PATTERNS - nothing else. As developers we see where there is major value in sticking with something that is "tried and true." If we could use web based patterns and 
protocols for a web based API we could not only get instant adoption but gain the efficiencies and effectiveness of technologies that
